# headscale Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "headscale" {
    endpoint = "https://headscale.example.org"
    api_key = "api_key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) A Headscale api key.
- `endpoint` (String) Headscale endpoint to connect to. (e.g. `https://headscale.example.com`)
